synopsis.text: After winning a prize cruise aboard an Aegis Destroyer warship conducting public exercises, Conan Edogawa and his friends find themselves embroiled in a dire situation. A crew member has been murdered and their severed arm discovered. With national security on the line, Conan realizes a foreign spy has infiltrated the vessel to steal classified military information. As Ran finds herself in jeopardy and the spy turns increasingly dangerous, Conan is forced into action. Teaming up with friends both on and off the ship, he races to identify the culprit and prevent fatal secrets from falling into the wrong hands. More than just the safety of those on board hangs in the balance - if confidential data is leaked, the entire country's defenses could be exposed. With lives at risk as well as national security, Conan pushes to crack the case before it's too late. Blending action and intrigue aboard an authentic warship, this movie promises excitement for fans along with insight into Japan's real-life military forces. As Conan confronts threats on multiple fronts, viewers are treated to a thrilling story that also manages to educate. Will Conan reveal the spy's identity and stop a national crisis in time?
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
